definition: (of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa

(of taste) hot or pungent/hard/laborious/suffering/eighth in order/eighth of the ten Heavenly Stems 十天干[shi2 tian1 gan1]/letter "H" or Roman "VIII" in list "A, B, C", or "I, II, III" etc/ancient Chinese compass point: 285°/octa
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
to carry (hanging down from the hand)/to lift/to put forward/to mention/to raise (an issue)/upwards character stroke/lifting brush stroke (in painting)/scoop for measuring liquid

sentences.english: The next World Choir Games will be held in Cincinnati.
sentences.chinese: 下一屆世界合唱節將在美國辛辛那提市舉行。

sentences.english: The family moved west, to the city of Cincinnati, on the Ohio River.
sentences.chinese: 這家人繼續向西，來到俄亥俄河畔的辛辛那提。

sentences.english: He's busy heckling Cincinnati and drinking a beer.
sentences.chinese: 他正忙着一邊喝啤酒一邊爲辛辛那提隊加油呢。

definition: St Louis, large city in eastern Missouri
